meanings.definition: A period of practical training for a job, especially one that involves working and learning at the same time.
meanings.sent1: During their traineeships, the students learned how to apply their knowledge in real work settings.
meanings.sent2: She completed two traineeships in different companies to gain experience.
meanings.sent3: The traineeships were like a bridge between studying and working, helping them transition smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The traineeships acted as stepping stones towards their future careers.
meanings.sent5: The traineeships provided hands-on experience that textbooks couldn't offer.

meanings.definition: The position or status of being a trainee.
meanings.sent1: His traineeships at the company gave him valuable insights into the industry.
meanings.sent2: She was excited to start her new traineeships and learn from experienced professionals.
meanings.sent3: The traineeships opened doors to new opportunities and growth.
meanings.sent4: In the world of traineeships, every day was a chance to learn something new.
meanings.sent5: The traineeships marked the beginning of their journey towards expertise in their field.
